name: Marc Santisteban Ruiz
description:
I'm Marc Santisteban Ruiz, I'm a mobile and fullstack web developer. I'm currently working at Arteco Consulting SL where I do the work of a fullstack web (frontend and backend) and from time to time I make mobile apps with Flutter.

Nowadays I'm improving my training in mobile development, for native apps both in Android (Kotlin) and iOS (Swift), where I'm making several applications to practice all the new concepts such as: local databases, functional programming, use of external libraries, maps, locations, image capture, etc...
